name: RH Brands
overview: RH Brands, LLC (www.rhbrands.com) is the holding company of a number of interactive, entertaining and unique ventures that include but are not limited to: “The Rejection HotlineÂ®”, “It Could Always Suck More”, “ScreenNumber.com”, and “Get Over it Dayâ„¢”.The Company’s network of sites, newsletters, and phone lines consistently attract millions of visitors, callers and mobile fans each month. Since 2001, RH Brands properties have entertained large audiences (mostly between the ages of 16-25) and most have been compelled to spread the word to their friends. In aggregate these properties create fertile grounds for advertising to and influencing a coveted young consumer audience. The ability to advertise to this audience (particularly using audio-based and mobile ads) is the core company offering.
